segment.source: Use the \[ConnectionSettings\] .INS file setting to specify the network connection settings needed to install your custom package.
segment.target: Use the \[ConnectionSettings\] .INS file setting to specify the network connection settings needed to install your custom package.

segment.source: Use the ConnectionSettings .INS file to review the network connections for install (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the ConnectionSettings .INS file to review the network connections for install (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the ConnectionSettings .INS file to review the network connections for install
segment.target: Use the ConnectionSettings .INS file to review the network connections for install

segment.source: Info about the network connection settings used to install your custom package.
segment.target: Info about the network connection settings used to install your custom package.

segment.source: This section creates a common configuration on all of your employee’s computers.
segment.target: This section creates a common configuration on all of your employee’s computers.

segment.source: Name
segment.target: Name

segment.source: Value
segment.target: Value

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: ConnectName0
segment.target: ConnectName0

segment.source: Name for the connection.
segment.target: Name for the connection.

segment.source: ConnectName1
segment.target: ConnectName1

segment.source: Secondary name for the connection.
segment.target: Secondary name for the connection.

segment.source: DeleteConnectionSettings
segment.target: DeleteConnectionSettings

segment.source: 0. Don’t remove the connection settings during installation.
segment.target: 0. Don’t remove the connection settings during installation.

segment.source: 1. Remove the connection settings during installation.
segment.target: 1. Remove the connection settings during installation.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This only appears for the Internal version of the IEAK 11.
segment.target: This only appears for the Internal version of the IEAK 11.

segment.source: Determines whether to remove the existing connection settings during installation of your custom package.
segment.target: Determines whether to remove the existing connection settings during installation of your custom package.

segment.source: Option
segment.target: Option

segment.source: 0. Don’t let employees import connection settings.
segment.target: 0. Don’t let employees import connection settings.

segment.source: 1. Let employees import connection settings.
segment.target: 1. Let employees import connection settings.

segment.source: Determines whether an employee can import connection settings into the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard.
segment.target: Determines whether an employee can import connection settings into the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard.
